Jan 13, 2016

095 PODCAST: Waiting at the Altar for Anze

Also available:
on iTunes
on Stitcher

Out with the new and in with the old! The Kings trade for some veteran presence with some potentially questionable returns. Meanwhile, Tyler Toffoli is flourishing and having his best season ever, Jonathan Quick is putting up numbers like it’s 2012, and SOMEONE PLEASE GIVE ANZE KOPITAR WHAT HE WANTS SO HE’LL STAY IN LA.
